comment: I was born with a rare Neuromuscular condition called Nemaline Myopathy . When I was a baby , the Doctors told my parents that I'd only survive a year . Today is my th birthday . It would really mean a lot to me if I got birthday greetings from around the World . Thank you .

comment: Wow Ryan . Not sure you remember me but we were often admitted together at I remember your room across from the nurses station on the th floor . I was only supposed to live a few months or years too ! We showed them ! I want to wish you a very happy birthday ! ! !
